segments.text: I can't believe how the woman is ignoring the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring onto the floor, and she doesn't even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy is trying to get cookies from the jar, standing on a wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, her hand reaching up towards the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is going to tip over and the boy will fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman should really pay attention to what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is going to be flooded if she doesn't turn off the faucet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the garden outside is so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really taking a risk to get those cookies, he must really want them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees what the children are doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on drying dishes that she doesn't see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR
